name: Glow Block Legend
description:
Here come a classic yet innovative glow block matching puzzle game. Switch and match your way through hundreds of levels in this amazingly shimmering block puzzle adventure. Reach the goal before the moves run out! Warning: Keep your eyes out for dazzling flowers, glow blocks and virus.

Game Features:
- Play with 144 levels of block collecting craziness
- Collect magic keys and earphones to help you pass the level easily
- Super easy but long-time training needed to the master level
- Challenge with your circles, defeat yourself is important
- Various blocks and colorful graphics
- Smooth and delicate animation

Explore the new world of terrific glow blocks for FREE now!!
